chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
sub: A -> A -> Prop
sub_reflexive: forall a : A, sub a a
sub_transitive: forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3

Goal:
forall (o1 o2 : option A) (e1 e2 : list (option A)), subsume (o1 :: e1) (o2 :: e2) -> osub o1 o2 /\ subsume e1 e2

Premises:
osub = fun o1 o2 : option A => forall a2 : A, o2 = Some a2 -> exists a1 : A, o1 = Some a1 /\ sub a1 a2 : option A -> option A -> Prop
subsume = fun e1 e2 : env A => forall x : nat, osub (lookup x e1) (lookup x e2) : env A -> env A -> Prop
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
subsume_insert : forall e1 e2 : env A, subsume e1 e2 -> forall (x : nat) (o1 o2 : option A), osub o1 o2 -> subsume (raw_insert x o1 e1) (raw_insert x o2 e2)
Tauto.I : Tauto.GFormula -> option ?AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.A : ?TA -> ?AA -> Tauto.GFormula where ?TA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?TX : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AA : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A ->...-> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?B : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
snd : ?A * ?B -> ?B where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?B : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
inl : ?A -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?B : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
fst : ?A * ?B -> ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?B : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
pair : ?A -> ?B -> ?A * ?B where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type] ?B : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
None : option ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Some : ?A -> option ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.ocons : option ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
Tauto.cons_id : option ?AF -> list ?AF -> list ?AF where ?AF : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
nil : list ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
VarMap.Empty : VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
EnvRing.PEX : BinNums.positive -> EnvRing.PExpr ?C where ?C : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
EnvRing.Pc : ?C -> EnvRing.Pol ?C where ?C : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
VarMap.Elt : ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
cons : ?A -> list ?A -> list ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
VarMap.Branch : VarMap.t ?A -> ?A -> VarMap.t ?A -> VarMap.t ?A where ?A : [A : Type sub : A -> A -> Prop sub_reflexive : forall a : A, sub a a sub_transitive : forall a1 a2 a3 : A, sub a1 a2 -> sub a2 a3 -> sub a1 a3 |- Type]
osub_Some_inversion : forall (o1 : option A) (a2 : A), osub o1 (Some a2) -> exists a1 : A, o1 = Some a1 /\ sub a1 a2
subsume_cons : forall (o : option A) (e1 e2 : env A), osub o (lookup 0 e2) -> subsume e1 (tl e2) -> subsume (o :: e1) e2
osub_Some_Some : forall a1 a2 : A, sub a1 a2 -> osub (Some a1) (Some a2)
osub_transitive : forall o1 o2 o3 : option A, osub o1 o2 -> osub o2 o3 -> osub o1 o3
subsume_transitive : forall e1 e2 e3 : env A, subsume e1 e2 -> subsume e2 e3 -> subsume e1 e3
osub_None_Some : forall a2 : A, osub None (Some a2) -> False
Relation_Operators.Ltl_sind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0
Add_sind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
Add_ind : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall l : list A, P l (a :: l)) -> (forall (x : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> P l l' -> P (x :: l) (x :: l')) -> forall l l0 : list A, Add a l l0 -> P l l0
